Package ca.bc.gov.app.validator

Interface ForestClientValidator<T>

All Known Implementing Classes:
AddressAddressValidator, AddressCityValidator, AddressComplementaryInformationValidator, AddressCountryValidator, AddressEmailValidator, AddressNameValidator, AddressNotesValidator, AddressPhoneNumberValidator, AddressPostalCodeValidator, AddressProvinceValidator, BusinessInformationAcronymValidator, BusinessInformationBirthdayValidator, BusinessInformationBusinessClientTypeValidator, BusinessInformationBusinessLegalTypeValidator, BusinessInformationBusinessNameValidator, BusinessInformationBusinessRegisteredNumberValidator, BusinessInformationBusinessTypeValidator, BusinessInformationClientTypeValidator, BusinessInformationDistrictValidator, BusinessInformationDoingBusinessValidator, BusinessInformationIdentificationDocumentValidator, BusinessInformationIndividualNameValidator, BusinessInformationNotesValidator, BusinessInformationWorkSafeValidator, ContactEmailValidator, ContactNameValidator, ContactPhoneNumberValidator, ContactTypeValidator, LocationAssociationValidator

    Method
    Description
    boolean
    supports(ValidationSourceEnum source)

  • Method Details

    • supports

      boolean supports(ValidationSourceEnum source)
      Returns if this validation can be used for the given source.
      Parameters:
      source - The source to check.
      Returns:
      True if this validation can be used for the given source, false otherwise.

    • validate

      reactor.core.publisher.Mono<ValidationError> validate(T target, Integer index)
      Validates the given target.
      Parameters:
      target - The target to validate.
      index - The index of the target, in case of a list of objects.
      Returns:
      A Mono that emits a ValidationError if the target is invalid, or completes if the target is valid.
